Package mudServer.Commands

Interface Summary
Command Command will encapsulate all player driven actions.
 

Class Summary
Attack This allows a player to attack a target The command checks if the argument is a target and does checks against Attack Strength, Defense Strength, attack speed, etc.
CommandFactory Parses commands and separates them from the arguments.
Depart Allows a dead character to be ressurected.
Drop Drops an item to the ground.
Get Gets an item from the room and puts it into the players hands.
Glance Displays the content of the players hands.
Health Reports total hitpoint to the player.
Logout Logs a player out of the game and saves his character.
Look Provides a description of an item or room.
Loot Removes a body from the game world.
Move Moves the player from his current room along a path to an adjoining room.
Say Allows the player to talk.
Swap  
UnknownCmd Notify the player that he dun fucked up!
